metadata.title: CVE-2024-43416 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 0.80 and prior to version 10.0.17, an unauthenticated user can usean application endpoint to check if an email address corresponds to a validGLPI user. Version 10.0.17 fixes the issue.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
